text:
@SecPompeo Iraq corrupted regime is NOT imposing flight restrictions to slow the spread of #COVID19.
Iran-Iraq border crossings are open to the #COVID19. There is no proper treatment at hospitals in #Iraq
#save_the_iraqi_people 
#نريد_وطن
